footer.description: The modern database client for demanding developers.

hero.title:
The Database.
<italic>Simplified.</italic>
hero.subtitle: A <highlight>modern</highlight>, <highlight>fast</highlight>, and <highlight>secure</highlight> database client for developers tired of slow and poorly designed tools.
hero.social_proof: Join <highlight>100+</highlight> developers waiting for the beta

preview.title: An interface built for <accent>developers</accent>
preview.description:
Dense yet breathable. Serious yet modern.
<subtext>Exactly what you expect from a professional tool.</subtext>

features.title: What QoreDB does <accent>well</accent>
features.subtitle: Designed for developers who want a tool that just works.

unified.title: Unified SQL + NoSQL
unified.desc: PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB in a single coherent interface.

vault.title: Security & Privacy
vault.desc: Encrypted credentials (Argon2) and GDPR compliant (zero telemetry).

ssh.title: SSH Tunneling
ssh.desc: Native support for SSH tunnels for remote databases.

library.title: Query Library
library.desc: Query library with folders, tags, and export.

envs.title: Environment Protection
envs.desc: Distinct Dev/Staging/Prod, mutation blocking in prod.

compatibility.title: Supported Databases
compatibility.coming_soon: SQLite, Redis and more coming soon...

cta.description: QoreDB is in active development. Sign up to be notified of the closed beta launch and shape the product with us.
cta.success: Thanks! You will be among the first to know.

why.description: DBeaver, phpMyAdmin, pgAdmin... They do the job, but the UX is mediocre, workflows are poorly optimized and they haven't evolved with the modern way of working.
